title: Google\Cloud\Language\V1\Sentence
name: Sentence
description:
Represents a sentence in the input document.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.language.v1.Sentence

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data

params.name: data.sentiment
params.description: For calls to [AnalyzeSentiment][] or if [AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_document_sentiment][google.cloud.language.v1.AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_document_sentiment] is set to true, this field will contain the sentiment for the sentence.
